data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Sirdaryo, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sirdaryo, Uzbekistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Sirdaryo to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary: On average, 122 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Sirdaryo, Uzbekistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,161 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Sirdaryo, Uzbekistan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kumyk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kumyk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kumyk people is yours.
Lord, the believers in the state of Sirdaryo, Uzbekistan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Sirdaryo.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Sirdaryo to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

location.name: Sirdaryo
